snippet: Elon Musk of Tesla and David Sacks of Yammer have left Mark Zuckerberg’s Fwd.us, which faces criticism from environmentalists over its lobbying tactics.
abstract: Elon Musk of Tesla and David Sacks of Yammer step down from Fwd.us, prominent Silicon Valley advocacy group spearheaded by Facebook co-founder and chief executive Mark Zuckerberg; group is pushing for changes to nation's immigration laws and sponsors advertisments promoting contentious oil pipeline, leading to criticism from environmentalists over its lobbying tactics.
lead_paragraph: Elon Musk of Tesla and David Sacks of Yammer have left Mark Zuckerberg’s Fwd.us, which faces criticism from environmentalists over its lobbying tactics.

headline.seo: Tesla’s Elon Musk Leaves Zuckerberg’s Fwd.us
headline.main: Technology Industry Lobbying Group Loses Supporters
headline.print_headline: Technology Industry Lobbying Group Loses Supporters
